name: Cat Crop Collector
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare #52, a weird little game

RATE THE GAME HERE

HOW TO PLAY
  • Go to crop and harvest
  • bring crop to wooden basket in the middle
  • left click to spray enemies dead
  • bring all crops to basket until timer runs out
CONTROLS

W A S D = Movement
E = Harvest/Deposit
Left Click = Shoot
SPACE = Jump
F11 = Fullscreen
M = Mute
ESC = Escape Mouse Cursor, click on game to recapture mouse again

Made with Godot 4 Beta 10. Requires Vulkan compatible GPU. No web version :(

Linux and Mac binaries are provided but only the Windows build has been tested.

Source Code
